name: Subadots
body:
It is a Universal Windows App, a Strategic Two-Player Game developed in C Sharp and XAML.

This game is a modified version of the classic Dots game, Implemented by designing a Pentagonal Web inspired by Cairo Tiling (It's pretty awesome! [check it out](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cairo_pentagonal_tiling)) and implementing Brute Force Algorithms to check for completed pentagons (1000 lines of bug-free code in 24-hours). Pretty Awesome huh? 

##Coming Soon on Windows Store
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
